setName

public void setName(String name)
Sets the name of this person. The name is obligatory.

Parameters:
name - Just the name, no XML, no HTML, no escaping.

setName

Sets the name of this person. The name is obligatory.

setURI

public void setURI(String uri)
Sets the URI of this person. The URI is not obligatory.

Parameters:

toElement

public Element toElement(Document document,
                         String tag)
Convert this person to an XML-DOM element with the given tag. Will include at least the obligatory name-element.

Parameters:
document - The document where the element will go.
tag - The tag of the element, example "author
Returns:
Element

Writes this person to an XML-SAX content handler with the given tag. Will include at least the obligatory name-element.
